entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who noticed another photograph of a Hogwarts Quidditch team.

entities.name: hogwarts quidditch team
entities.description: The team is described as smiling and waving out of the frame.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as a house with snakes emblazoned on their chests.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is described as the boy sitting in the middle of the front row.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as Regulus' brother.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's press clippings are being read by Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry noticed the Hogwarts Quidditch team.
Regulus is a member of Slytherin house.
Harry is related to Voldemort through the press clippings being read by Hermione.
